name: HackQuest
fullText:
Solar Mini Hacker House · Chengdu Recap 📸

Our 5-day retreat to prep for Solana’s Cypherpunk Hackathon:
💻 Hands-on workshops
🤝 Mentorship from @SolanaFndn & @HackQuest_
💰 Gearing up for a global $500K+ prize pool

Day 1 kicked off with orientation and hotpot 🔥 https://t.co/p3dlwkFvC7

name: 登链社区
OpenBuild
fullText:
🎉 Recap: @AleoHQ  Aleo x OpenBuild Dev Party in Shanghai was a success!

Last Sunday, developers, privacy enthusiasts & Web3 builders gathered to explore #ZKP, #Aleo ecosystem updates, and the future of privacy-first infrastructure.

Thanks to all who joined the insightful talks https://t.co/cF8SYOL13v
